channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- youForms for WordPress – Creating Forms for CopeCart
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- youForms for WordPress – Creating Forms for CopeCart

item.title: CVE-2021-24596|2024-08-03T19:35:20.237Z -- unknown -- youforms%20for%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20creating%20forms%20for%20copecart
item.description: The youForms for WordPress plugin through 1.0.5 does not sanitise escape the Button Text field of its Templates, allowing high privilege users (editors and admins) to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
